cs201.coggi22c.presguessgme

Class QuestionsGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs201.coggi22c.presguessgme.QuestionsGame

  • public class QuestionsGame
extends java.lang.Object
    QuestionsGame runs the 20 Questions game. It parses the XML file, keeps track of the user's place in the binary tree, and displays the win and lose states.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      void chooseBranch(java.lang.String choice)
      Figures out whether the game is over, the player has chosen yes, or the player has chosen no.

      Invokes win or lose state.
      java.lang.String getCities()
      Gets all leaves that could still be the one the user picked
      java.lang.String getQuestion()
      Returns the new question to ask the user
      java.lang.String leafFind()
      Creates a list of cities that the user could have picked in one String to be displayed
      void newGame()
      Parses the XML file and sets holdPlace to the root of the tree.
